dictionary.name: Committee Name
dictionary.definition: Name of committee to which contribution was made. Name associated with committee SBOE-ID.
dictionary.source: Reported by committee to North Carolina State Board of Elections on Form CRO-1210 Contributions from Individuals Field 1 Committee Full Name (and Fund if applicable) [will expand to include other relevant forms].

dictionary.name: Committee City
dictionary.definition: City of address of committee to which contribution was made
dictionary.source: As reported to North Carolina State Board of Elections on CRO-2100A Statement of Organization - Candidate Committee Field b. Associated with ID Number. [will add more more committee types]

dictionary.name: Committee State
dictionary.definition: State of address of committee to which contribution was made
dictionary.source: As reported to North Carolina State Board of Elections on CRO-2100A Statement of Organization - Candidate Committee Field b. Associated with ID Number. [will add more more committee types]

dictionary.name: Amount
dictionary.source: North Carolina State Board of Elections form CRO-1210 Contributions from Individuals field k

dictionary.name: Name
dictionary.definition: First and last name of individual, name of committee, or name of business
dictionary.source: Reported by committee to North Carolina State Board of Elections on Form CRO-1210 Contributions from Individuals Field 3a Contributor Information [will expand to include other relevant forms].

dictionary.name: Contributor City
dictionary.source: Reported by committee to North Carolina State Board of Elections on Form CRO-1210 Contributions from Individuals Field 3a Contributor Information [will expand to include other relevant forms].

dictionary.name: Contributor State
dictionary.source: Reported by committee to North Carolina State Board of Elections on Form CRO-1210 Contributions from Individuals Field 3a Contributor Information [will expand to include other relevant forms].
